alert.note: Alert for New York (Manhattan); Northern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued January 25 at 2:50PM EST until January 26 at 5:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM EST THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...New York (Manhattan) and Northern Queens Counties. * WHEN...From 9 PM EST this evening through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy rain during or just before time of high tide will likely exacerbate street flooding in low lying and coastal communities around the time of high tide.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
